name: Soldier
description: Disciplined warriors trained in the art of conventional warfare, specializing in weapons mastery, tactical combat, and battlefield control through superior training and equipment.

resource_systems.name: Stamina
resource_systems.description: Physical energy that powers combat abilities and tactical maneuvers
mechanics: Stamina points are spent to perform special combat maneuvers and tactical abilities
Some abilities require maintaining focus, consuming stamina over time
Short rests restore a portion of maximum stamina
Depleted stamina causes penalties to attack speed and defensive capabilities
Can be temporarily boosted through adrenaline in critical situations

resource_systems.name: Combat Readiness
resource_systems.description: State of tactical awareness and preparation that enhances combat effectiveness
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds during combat, decreases during periods of inaction
mechanics: Increases by 10 when landing critical hits or successfully defending against attacks
Increases by 5 per 10 seconds in active combat
Decreases by 10 when taking critical hits or being caught off-guard
Decreases by 5 per minute when out of combat
Can be spent to enhance combat abilities or execute special maneuvers

class_mechanics.name: Weapons Mastery
class_mechanics.description: Exceptional proficiency with a wide range of conventional weapons
effects: Increased damage and accuracy with all conventional weapons
Reduced cooldown on weapon-based abilities
Can switch between weapons during combat without penalties
Able to identify and exploit weaknesses in enemy weapons and armor
Can use improvised weapons with the same proficiency as proper weapons

class_mechanics.name: Combat Tactics
class_mechanics.description: Knowledge of battlefield strategies and tactical maneuvers
effects: Can analyze enemy formations and identify tactical advantages
Able to coordinate attacks with allies for increased effectiveness
Gain combat bonuses when fighting in advantageous positions
Can predict enemy movements and prepare appropriate counters
Presence improves the combat effectiveness of nearby allies

class_mechanics.name: Battle Hardened
class_mechanics.description: Physical and mental resilience developed through combat experience
effects: Increased resistance to physical damage and status effects
Reduced recovery time from injuries and negative effects
Can continue fighting effectively even when severely wounded
Resistance to fear, intimidation, and morale-affecting abilities
Presence bolsters the courage and determination of allies

class_mechanics.name: Field Expertise
class_mechanics.description: Practical knowledge of survival, equipment maintenance, and battlefield conditions
effects: Can maintain and repair equipment in the field
Able to adapt to various terrain and weather conditions
Can identify and utilize environmental advantages in combat
Increased effectiveness when using military equipment and supplies
Can establish secure camps and defensive positions quickly

skill_trees.name: Frontline Fighter
key_abilities: Shield Wall: Significantly increase defense and block chance
Taunt: Force enemies to attack you instead of allies
Counterattack: Automatically strike back after successfully blocking an attack

skill_trees.name: Combat Specialist
key_abilities: Precision Strike: Target vital points for increased damage
Weapon Expertise: Gain special abilities based on equipped weapon type
Combat Flow: Chain attacks together for increasing damage bonuses

skill_trees.name: Field Tactician
key_abilities: Tactical Assessment: Identify enemy weaknesses and relay them to allies
Coordinated Strike: Set up powerful combination attacks with allies
Battlefield Control: Manipulate enemy positioning through tactical maneuvers

arch_classes.name: Commander
arch_classes.description: Soldiers who have mastered the art of leadership and battlefield control, able to inspire allies and coordinate devastating tactical maneuvers.

lore: Soldiers represent the backbone of any military force, combining disciplined training with practical combat experience to become effective warriors in any battlefield situation. Unlike the mystical powers of mages or the divine blessings of clerics, soldiers rely on honed skills, tactical knowledge, and physical prowess to overcome their enemies. Their training encompasses not just combat techniques but also field survival, equipment maintenance, and battlefield tactics, making them versatile and adaptable fighters. Many soldiers begin their careers in formal military organizations, where they learn the fundamentals of warfare through rigorous training and live combat exercises. Others may develop their skills through militia service, mercenary work, or out of necessity in dangerous borderlands. Regardless of their background, all soldiers share a practical approach to combat and a respect for discipline and preparation. In battle, soldiers are reliable combatants who can adapt to changing situations, utilize available resources effectively, and maintain their effectiveness even in prolonged engagements. Their understanding of tactical positioning and battlefield dynamics makes them valuable members of any adventuring party, able to protect vulnerable allies while dealing significant damage to enemies. Though they may lack the flashy abilities of more magical classes, the consistent performance and versatility of soldiers make them indispensable in virtually any combat situation.
